bibl.title: Unpublished Latin papyri from Dura-Europos at the Beinecke Library
bibl.note: Context. - P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. DP 121. Box containing five to six bricks of baked mud, one of which presents layers of small papyrus fragments attached to its surface. - Other Items: 1. Inv. DP 23 fr. a; - 2. Inv. DP 23 fr. b; - 3. Inv. DP 23 fr. h; - 4. Inv. DP 16 fr. 2 recto; - 5. Inv. 16 fr. 3 recto; - 6. Inv. DP 16 fr. 1 verso; - 7-17. Inv. s.n. - Appendix.
bibl.seg: 141.5 P. Yale Inv. DP 16, fr. 1 verso; fr. 2 recto; fr. 3 recto; 23, fr. a; fr. b; fr. h; 121
Giulio Iovine, Unpublished Latin Papyri from Dura-Europos at the Beinecke Library.

Context. - P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. DP 121. Box containing five to six bricks of baked mud, one of which presents layers of small papyrus fragments attached to its surface. - Other Items: 1. Inv. DP 23 fr. a; - 2. Inv. DP 23 fr. b; - 3. Inv. DP 23 fr. h; - 4. Inv. DP 16 fr. 2 recto; - 5. Inv. 16 fr. 3 recto; - 6. Inv. DP 16 fr. 1 verso; - 7-17. Inv. s.n. - Appendix.
